com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.base

Interface EntityPermission<T extends NamedDto & ReferableDto>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectPermission, ScmRepositoryPermission, TrackerPermission, UserPermission

    public interface EntityPermission<T extends NamedDto & ReferableDto>
    The basic interface of an entity permission
